programme.title: Pie to Die For: A Hannah Swensen Mystery
programme.desc: Movie (2025) When Hannah's customer and Delores' theater rival is murdered, Hannah must find her killer in order to save her mother's reputation. Chad and Hannah's romance blossoms.

programme.title: Super Storm
programme.desc: Movie (2011) A high-school student creates a science project that holds the key to saving the Earth from devastating cyclones.

programme.title: Minari
programme.desc: Movie (2020) A Korean American family moves to an Arkansas farm in search of its own American dream. Amidst the challenges of this new life in the strange and rugged Ozarks, they discover the undeniable resilience of family and what really makes a home.

programme.title: Christmas Unfiltered
programme.desc: Movie (2022) On Christmas Eve, Becky wishes that her family would truly hear her. All of her thoughts and frustrations begin to spill out as she inadvertently starts telling everyone what she really thinks.

programme.title: Collision Earth
programme.desc: Movie (2012) A top-secret military weapon must destroy the planet Mercury before it crashes into Earth.

programme.title: Snowmageddon
programme.desc: Movie (2011) An Alaskan town faces destruction after a family finds on the doorstep a snow globe that affects the real world.

programme.title: I Am Raquel Welch
programme.desc: Celebrating the life of a trailblazing actress and single mother who not only redefined the world's idea of a Hollywood sex symbol, but also led the way for modern-day action heroines.

programme.title: Jaws
programme.desc: Movie (1975) A New England police chief (Roy Scheider), a shark hunter (Robert Shaw) and a scientist (Richard Dreyfuss) have a showdown with a huge white shark.

programme.title: I Saw the TV Glow
programme.desc: Movie (2024) A classmate introduces teenage Owen to a mysterious late-night TV show -- a vision of a supernatural world beneath their own. In the pale glow of the television, Owen's view of reality begins to crack.

programme.title: A Thousand Cuts ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2024) While investigating a notorious 30-year-old unsolved murder on a true crime special, the hosts find themselves dangerously intertwined with the case as their relationship begins to derail and mysteriously echo the brutal murders, all on live TV.

programme.title: Self Driver ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2024) Facing mounting expenses and the unrelenting pressure of modern living, a down-on-his-luck cab driver is lured by a mysterious new app that promises fast, easy money.

programme.title: The Godfather, Part II
programme.desc: Movie (1974) Michael Corleone (Al Pacino) rules his father's criminal empire, while flashbacks recall young Vito's (Robert De Niro) climb to power.

programme.title: Poor Things
programme.desc: Movie (2023) Brought back to life by an unorthodox scientist, a young woman runs off with a lawyer on a whirlwind adventure across the continents. Free from the prejudices of her times, she grows steadfast in her purpose to stand for equality and liberation.

programme.title: Storm Seekers
programme.desc: Movie (2009) Scientists study the effects of global warming on hurricane frequency and strength.

programme.title: 'Twas the Text Before Christmas
programme.desc: Movie (2023) A text message mistakenly sent to Addie leads to a friendship with the sender, a Christmas tradition with the woman's family, and a budding romance with her son.

programme.title: Christmas Icetastrophe
programme.desc: Movie (2014) An asteroid strike in a small town unleashes ice crystals, threatening to freeze anything in its path.

programme.title: Dark Side of the 90s
programme.desc: S01E10 Internet 1.0: Don't Believe the Hype In the 1990s, the surge of internet-exclusive companies captures the dreams and greed of American investors; in its wake, the beloved Pets.com puppet is killed.

programme.title: Batman Returns
programme.desc: Movie (1992) The Caped Crusader (Michael Keaton) clashes with Catwoman (Michelle Pfeiffer) and saves gloomy Gotham City from the foul Penguin's (Danny DeVito) plot.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: The Movie
programme.desc: Movie (2021) When their biggest rival, Humdinger, starts wreaking havoc as the mayor of Adventure City, Ryder and everyone's favorite heroic pups kick into high gear to face the challenge.

programme.title: PAW Patrol: The Mighty Movie
programme.desc: Movie (2023) The PAW Patrol pups magically gain superpowers after a meteor strikes Adventure City. However, things take a turn for the worse when Humdinger and a mad scientist steal their powers and turn themselves into supervillains.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
programme.desc: Movie (2009) After the abrupt departure of Edward, her vampire love, Bella finds comfort in her deepening friendship with Jacob Black. However Bella's loyalties are put to the test as she becomes drawn into the world of werewolves, ancient enemies of vampires.

programme.title: The Twilight Saga: Eclipse
programme.desc: Movie (2010) Bella must choose between Edward and Jacob amid a string of mysterious killings and a malicious vampire's quest for revenge.

programme.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2021) When Peter Parker asks for help from Doctor Strange, the stakes become even more dangerous, forcing him to discover what it truly means to be Spider-Man.

programme.title: Hostile Takeover ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2025) A professional hit man faces a group of assassins after the boss of a crime syndicate suspects disloyalty due to his attendance at Workaholics Anonymous meetings.

programme.title: Joker: Folie à Deux
programme.desc: Movie (2024) Struggling with his dual identity, failed comedian Arthur Fleck stumbles upon true love while incarcerated at Arkham State Hospital. Awaiting trial for the murder of five people, Fleck soon discovers the music that's always been inside him.

programme.title: Thirteen Lives
programme.desc: Movie (2022) Rescue workers try to save 12 boys and their soccer coach from a flooded, impenetrable cave system in Thailand.

programme.title: Dress for Success
programme.desc: Movie (2023) A refugee turned fashionista lawyer launches her own brand of designer philanthropy.

programme.title: Gem & Shaz
programme.desc: Movie (2023) Two Asian Canadian teenage girls are given one hour at the school dance by their strict immigrant parents and are determined to make the most of it.

programme.title: Under the Christmas Tree
programme.desc: Movie (2021) Romantic sparks fly between Alma and Charlie when Charlie finds the perfect tree for the Maine governor's holiday celebration right in Alma's backyard.

programme.title: The Curious Case of Dolphin Bay
programme.desc: Movie (2022) A group of friends are spending the summer working as interns at a research center, which is researching unnatural changes in the local reef. After strange events begin to occur, the friends suspect a local legend may be tied to the reef's problems.

programme.title: Secret Headquarters
programme.desc: Movie (2022) When Charlie and his friends discover that his dad is a powerful superhero, the youngsters spring into action to defend his secret headquarters and save the planet from a villainous threat.

programme.title: You Only Live Twice
programme.desc: Movie (1967) During the Cold War, American and Russian spacecrafts go missing, leaving each superpower believing the other is to blame. As the world teeters on the brink of nuclear war, British intelligence learns that one of the crafts has landed in the Sea of Japan. After faking his own death, secret agent James Bond (Sean Connery) is sent to investigate. In Japan, he's aided by Tiger Tanaka (Tetsuro Tamba) and the beautiful Aki (Akiko Wakabayashi), who help him uncover a sinister global conspiracy.

programme.title: Barefoot Contessa
programme.desc: S26E21 Cook Like a Pro: Incredible Vegetables Ina transforms ordinary vegetables into extraordinary dishes; cauliflower toasts, baked spinach and zucchini and then an eggplant steps into the limelight in wonderful spiced lamb-stuffed eggplants that are classy enough for company.

Miranda Richardson, Gabriel Byrne, Lynn Redgrave, John Neville, Bradley Hall.

programme.title: Wedding Crashers
programme.desc: In this raucous romp (unedited version), rascally charmers Owen Wilson and Vince Vaughn are the life of the party as a pair of engaging lotharios who sneak into wedding receptions and scam their way into the hearts of impressionable young women. Things take a wild turn when they fall for two sisters (Rachel McAdams, Isla Fisher) who happen to be the daughters of a Kennedy-esque politician. Directed by David Dobkin. Christopher Walken, Jane Seymour, Keir O'Donnell, Bradley Cooper.

programme.title: The Hoax
programme.desc: Richard Gere is a fascinating portrait in brazen panache as disgraced author and con artist Clifford Irving, who tricked the public in the early 1970s by claiming to have written an "authorized" biography of eccentric billionaire Howard Hughes. Marcia Gay Harden is excellent as Irving's misguided wife, and Alfred Molina gives a captivating performance as the author's right-hand man, who's fully aware that Irving has something up his sleeve. Directed by Lasse Hallstrom. Julie Delpy, Hope Davis.

programme.title: The Escapist
programme.desc: The tension grinds in this tale of an aged convict attempting a bold escape in order to be with his ailing daughter on the outside. Frank Perry (Brian Cox) never had a problem with serving his due time, until he discovered that his daughter is very ill following a drug overdose. Now he needs to get out, but he can't do it on his own. Recruiting a gang of motley inmates to help carry out his escape plan, Frank prepares to make a break for it.

programme.title: Marlene
programme.desc: Frank is a contract killer working for a large Styrian crime syndicate. When he is given the task of abducting a girl named Marlene and delivering her to the syndicate, everything changes for Frank. He falls in love with Marlene and disobeys his superiors, who in turn take matters into their own hands and abduct Marlene themselves. Now Frank has to battle the blunt forces of the syndicate in order to save Marlene.

programme.title: The Dead Girl
programme.desc: Writer-director Karen Moncrieff assembles an impressive ensemble in this moody and affecting psychodrama, which contains five interlocking stories connected by the murder of a prostitute. The stellar cast is lead by Toni Collette, whose character stumbles upon the homicide victim. Other top-notch performances are turned in by Marcia Gay Harden, Kerry Washington and Mary Beth Hurt. Josh Brolin, Giovanni Ribisi, Rose Byrne, Mary Steenburgen, Piper Laurie, Brittany Murphy, James Franco.

programme.desc: Richard Gere is a fascinating portrait in brazen panache as disgraced author and con artist Clifford Irving, who tricked the public in the early 1970s by claiming to have written an "authorized" biography of eccentric billionaire Howard Hughes. Marcia Gay Harden is excellent as Irving's misguided wife, and Alfred Molina gives a captivating performance as the author's right-hand man, who's fully aware that Irving has something up his sleeve. Directed by Lasse Hallstrom. Julie Delpy, Hope Davis.

programme.title: Black Hawk Down
programme.desc: Ridley Scott's harrowing account of the doomed 1993 American mission to capture two top lieutenants of a Somali warlord.

programme.title: Real Time
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler is given one hour to live by the hitman who has been hired to kill him. Randy Quaid ("Brokeback Mountain") and Jay Baruchel ("Tropic Thunder") star in this taut and darkly humorous dramedy from writer-director Randall Cole. Jayne Eastwood, Ella Chan.

programme.title: Acquainted
programme.desc: Former classmates run into each other at a bar and form an unexpected bond.

programme.title: Vandits
programme.desc: The narrative centers on the Vandits, a small amateur gang of stoner criminals, on their unlikely Christmas Eve heist. The four crooks decide to attack a bingo hall at a senior home and rob the winnings on Christmas Eve. What follows is a journey of mischief and mayhem.

programme.title: Meditation Park
programme.desc: Maria reevaluates the life that she and her husband, Bing, have built after emigrating from Hong Kong when she finds evidence that he's having an affair. She soon decides to take back control of her life from Bing by getting a job, making new friends and discovering her own dreams.

programme.title: 500 Days of Summer
programme.desc: Greeting-card copywriter Tom falls head over heels for his co-worker Summer in this romantic comedy. Tom thinks that he's finally found his soul mate, but Summer claims not to believe in true love and is only interested in having some fun with Tom.

programme.title: Marlene
programme.desc: Frank is a contract killer working for a large Styrian crime syndicate. When he is given the task of abducting a girl named Marlene and delivering her to the syndicate, everything changes for Frank. He falls in love with Marlene and disobeys his superiors, who in turn take matters into their own hands and abduct Marlene themselves. Now Frank has to battle the blunt forces of the syndicate in order to save Marlene.

programme.title: Acquainted
programme.desc: Former classmates run into each other at a bar and form an unexpected bond.

programme.title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
programme.desc: Cigar-chomping demon Hellboy (Ron Perlman), the Bureau for Paranormal Research and Defense's secret weapon against things that go bump in the night, returns to battle a supernatural prince with an ancient grudge against puny humans. Writer-director Guillermo del Toro's sequel improves on his original, showcasing wickedly elegant monsters and spectacular action sequences.

programme.title: Resident Evil: Apocalypse
programme.desc: Milla Jovovich battles zombies and a sinister corporation in this sequel.

As Cameron grapples with reality, whispers of a ghost named Jacky beckon him to unravel a chilling mystery and confront the truth about his own father.

programme.title: The Grand Seduction
programme.desc: The residents of a small village seek to charm a young doctor in order to secure a business contract. Later, as the deadline for the contract draws near, their deceptions begin to falter and their financial future is in dire straits.

programme.title: Kin
programme.desc: S2 E1 In the wake of Eamon Cunningham's death, the Kinsella family is thriving. However a new threat rears its head when a Turkish cartel inform the Kinsellas that Eamon owed them a sizeable debt and since they killed him, the debt is now theirs.

programme.title: Kin

programme.desc: A Year in Film: 1988 Film and pop culture experts discuss the iconic and influential films of 1988, including "Die Hard," "Coming to America," "Rain Man," "Working Girl," "Beetlejuice," "Big" and "Hairspray.".

programme.title: Writing with Fire
programme.desc: A candid look at India's only independent, women-owned and operated newspaper. At the paper's helm stands chief reporter Meera who strives to deliver unbiased reporting on controversial issues that affect marginalized sectors despite the criticisms of her male-dominated society.

programme.title: Black Box Diaries
programme.desc: When Shiori Ito took the risk of naming her high-profile rapist, she didn't expect to become the face of the #MeToo movement in Japan. This documentary explores that, as well as the deep consequences of going public with her accusations. The conversation is intimate since the director is also the victim, and the context is often video diaries as she tries to bring her abuser to justice.

programme.desc: This documentary explores how nudity has been handled on the silver screen from the silent film era to the present digital age, presenting morality, sexism, production, and censorship issues surrounding various facets of being naked in Hollywood. programme.title: Backstabbing For Beginners
programme.desc: A young straight-laced diplomat flies to Bagdad on a mission with the United Nations and is thrust into a world of ever-spreading corruption. He gains intel about a scheme regarding oil reserves in Iraq but his efforts to expose those involved have grave consequences.

programme.title: Drifting Snow
programme.desc: Two strangers, Joanne (Sonja Smits) and Chris (Jonas Bonnetta) share a winter road trip through rural eastern Ontario. After losing her husband John (Colin Mochrie), Joanne faces the rituals of remote rural life on her own, while Chris is processing his failing eyesight and the loss of his mother and the new responsibility of taking over her old home in the country. As their journey together unfolds, their drifting memories reveal parallel experiences.

programme.desc: S01: Grab Life by the P Saje is struggling with the breakup, trying to pick herself up and focus on her desire to obtain a writing profession. Ava and her boyfriend are fighting over their sexless relationship, but Ava has an idea to repair it.

programme.title: Poly Is the New Monogamy
programme.desc: S01: The Price to Pay Saje is under pressure to complete a script for a new job in 24 hours, but Ethan reappears and complicates everything just as she thought she could go on. Her new potential boss, Ruby, also piques Saje's curiosity.

programme.title: Poly Is the New Monogamy
programme.desc: S01: Tears. Lots of Tears Saje and her new polyamorous boss Ruby embark on a mission to reclaim their individual treasures from their former partners. Ava becomes terrified and refuses sex therapy until she discovers more about Dr. Carson's past. Zoe devises a "get em back" plot.

programme.title: Poly Is the New Monogamy
programme.desc: S01: The Goat Yoga Connection Just as things are returning to normal, Ethan suggests a threesome. Saje is unsure about her sexuality and relationships. Zoe attends a goat yoga retreat to recover from the anguish of being alone forever.

programme.title: Poly Is the New Monogamy
programme.desc: S01: Emotionally Constipated Saje's friendship with Ethan, as well as her love for Ruby, become clearer. she faces a difficult decision. Zoe must control her nervous tick for an impending "meet the parents" date with a new partner.

programme.title: Less Than Kosher
programme.desc: At 20, Viv was a promising young singer. At 30, her failing music career has forced her back into her mother's basement. But when this self proclaimed Bad Jew lands A.-backwards into a job as a Cantor at her family's synagogue, she's thrown into a wild ride of illicit affairs, drug trips, tense family drama, self discovery and some serious Jewish bops. It's "Shiva Baby" meets "A Star is Born." Modern Jewish wit and Hebrew Electro-Pop.

programme.desc: Paul Newman and Elizabeth Taylor sizzle together in this Oscar-nominated Best Picture that adapts Tennessee Williams' Pulitzer-winning play about a smoldering wife (Taylor) who watches her bitter young husband (Newman) turn to the bottle. programme.title: X, Y & Zee
programme.desc: Elizabeth Taylor and Michael Caine depict the relationship of a London couple, whose childless union is disrupted by an attractive widow (Susannah York). Brian G. Hutton directed.

programme.title: Giant
programme.desc: Wealthy rancher Bick Benedict and dirt-poor cowboy Jett Rink both woo Leslie Lynnton, a beautiful young woman from Maryland who is new to Texas. She marries Benedict, but she is shocked by the racial bigotry of the White Texans against the local people of Mexican descent. Rink discovers oil on a small plot of land, and while he uses his vast, new wealth to buy all the land surrounding the Benedict ranch, the Benedict's disagreement over prejudice fuels conflict that runs across generations.

programme.title: Dance, Girl, Dance
programme.desc: A ballet dancer and a burlesque queen each use their very different but very impressive seductive styles to compete for the affections of the same wealthy suitor.

programme.desc: The 49ers and Seahawks meet to begin the season. San Francisco followed up an NFC title with a disappointing 6-11 run in 2024. Seattle moved on from DK Metcalf during the offseason, but inked quarterback Sam Darnold and Yakima, Wash., WR Cooper Kupp.

programme.title: NFL Football : Buffalo Bills at Denver Broncos ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: The Broncos battle against the Bills at Empower Field at Mile High. Denver's Bo Nix is the fourth QB in franchise history to lead the team to No. 1 seed. Buffalo's James Cook had 15 carries for 46 yards in the Wild Card win in his previous game.

programme.title: NFL Football : San Francisco 49ers at Seattle Seahawks ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: The Seahawks (14-3) host the 49ers (12-5) in the NFC Divisional Round. Seattle secured the No. 1 seed, while the 49ers advanced after an upset win over the Eagles. Seahawks won the most recent showdown 13-3 against the 49ers to clinch the NFC West.

programme.title: Sanctuary

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E13 One Night Looking to share a quiet evening out with Abby, Will and his date are abducted en route to the restaurant by a gang leader who faces certain death without their help; upon learning the abductor's identity, Magnus ceases all attempts at rescue.

programme.title: Air Bud: Seventh Inning Fetch
programme.desc: Movie (2002) The golden retriever joins a middle-school baseball team and searches for his missing offspring.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: Movie (2000) The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher.

programme.title: Racetime
programme.desc: Movie (2018) After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

programme.title: Weathering With You
programme.desc: Movie (2019) A boy runs away to Tokyo and befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.

programme.title: Superman Returns
programme.desc: Movie (2006) While Lex Luthor plots against him, the Man of Steel tries to reconnect with Lois Lane and find his place in a world that learned to survive in his absence.

programme.title: Pacific Rim
programme.desc: Movie (2013) As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in an effort to save the world.

programme.title: The Meg
programme.desc: Movie (2018) A massive creature attacks a deep-sea submersible, leaving it disabled and trapping the crew at the bottom of the Pacific Ocean. With time running out, a rescue diver must now confront an unimaginable threat -- a 75-foot-long prehistoric shark.

programme.title: Power Book IV: Force ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: S03E10 Beginning of the End The mounting pressure for retaliation looms, as disastrous moves and shocking secrets shake the streets.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: S02E01 Tale of Two Brothers Growing up in Detroit alongside his brother Meech, Terry reflects on their journey; the Flenory family faced the threat of losing everything, pushing the brothers to the drug trade; however, success in the game often comes with deadly rivalries.

programme.title: Johnny Mnemonic
programme.desc: Movie (1995) Corporate thugs chase a guy carrying classified data in his computer-chip brain in the year 2021.

programme.title: Edge of Winter
programme.desc: Movie (2016) Stranded at a remote cabin in the wintertime, two siblings (Tom Holland, Percy Hynes White) must fight for survival as their increasingly unhinged father (Joel Kinnaman) loses his grip on reality.

programme.title: Hyena Road
programme.desc: Movie (2015) During the war in Afghanistan, an intelligence officer (Paul Gross) enlists a sniper (Rossif Sutherland) to track down a legendary freedom fighter.

programme.title: Presumed Innocent
programme.desc: Movie (1990) A married prosecutor (Harrison Ford) hires an attorney (Raul Julia) to defend him against charges of murdering his seductive colleague.

programme.title: One Day in the Life of Noah Piugattuk
programme.desc: Movie (2019) A government agent tries to get an Inuit man and his children to move to settlement housing.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Movie (1996) A little girl develops extraordinary mental abilities, despite neglectful parents and a brutal headmistress.

programme.title: Ghostbusters
programme.desc: Movie (2016) Armed with proton packs and plenty of attitude, four women (Melissa McCarthy, Kristen Wiig, Leslie Jones, Kate McKinnon) prepare for an epic battle as mischievous ghosts start to wreak havoc in New York.

programme.title: The Devil Wears Prada
programme.desc: Movie (2006) A recent college graduate lands a job working for a famous and diabolical editor of a New York fashion magazine.

programme.title: Legally Blonde
programme.desc: Movie (2001) A sorority queen (Reese Witherspoon) enrolls in Harvard to prove to her former boyfriend that she has more than good looks.

programme.title: Legally Blonde 2: Red, White & Blonde
programme.desc: Movie (2003) Fired from her firm, a young Boston lawyer (Reese Witherspoon) heads to Washington, D.C., to fight for animal rights.

programme.title: Moulin Rouge
programme.desc: Movie (2001) In the 1890s France a courtesan falls in love with a young writer but strings along a duke who can finance improvements to the night spot.

programme.title: Country Strong
programme.desc: Movie (2010) Personal demons, complicated romantic entanglements and the demands of fame threaten to derail the comeback tour of a country-music superstar (Gwyneth Paltrow).

programme.title: A Star Is Born ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2018) Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers and falls in love with a struggling, but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Inside Llewyn Davis
programme.desc: Movie (2013) In 1960s New York, a struggling folk singer with genuine talent sets his sights on stardom, but success proves elusive.

programme.title: Stage Fright
programme.desc: Movie (2014) Blood begins to spill soon after the daughter (Allie MacDonald) of a Broadway diva wins the lead in the summer showcase at a performing-arts camp.

programme.title: Moving Day
programme.desc: Movie (2012) A misfit furniture mover (Will Sasso) fantasizes about leaving his unfulfilling job for an equally unfulfilling job on a municipal road crew.

programme.title: Maliglutit
programme.desc: Movie (2016) In 1913 in the Canadian Arctic, Kuanana returns from hunting to find his wife and daughter kidnapped and sets of to find the men who did it.

programme.title: The Games Maker
programme.desc: Movie (2014) Ivan's love of board games transports him into the competitive world of game invention.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: Movie (2014) A plucky youngster (Quvenzhané Wallis) escapes the clutches of her calculating foster mother and charms her way into the heart of a hard-nosed tycoon (Jamie Foxx), who's running for mayor.

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: Movie (1976) Heavyweight champ Apollo Creed gives Philadelphia club fighter Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) a title shot.

programme.title: Rocky II
programme.desc: Movie (1979) Underdog Philadelphia fighter Rocky Balboa (Sylvester Stallone) gets another shot at heavyweight champ Apollo Creed.

programme.title: Rocky III
programme.desc: Movie (1982) Following his crushing defeat by Clubber Lang, Rocky Balboa joins forces with Apollo Creed in an effort to regain his title.

programme.title: Rocky IV
programme.desc: Movie (1985) Heavyweight champion Rocky Balboa trains in Siberia for a match against the Soviet fighter who killed Apollo Creed. In front of a ferocious Russian crowd, he fights for one final showdown.

programme.title: Rocky V
programme.desc: Movie (1990) Broke, punchy and at odds with his son, boxer Rocky (Sylvester Stallone) trains a hungry contender, then must street-fight him.

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: Movie (2006) Retired Rocky's (Sylvester Stallone) plan to re-enter the ring for a few small matches escalates into a full-fledged bout with the world's reigning heavyweight.

programme.title: Blood Quantum

programme.title: At First Light

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen

programme.title: Sanctuary

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E15 Wingman Will and Henry's double date goes awry when Magnus insists they do a routine delivery of an Abnormal en route.

programme.title: Nelly & Simon: Mission Yeti

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: S01E01 A misunderstanding, a surprise visit and a stolen umbrella intertwine the lives of three families -- the Schlegels, the Wilcoxes and the Basts.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: S01E02 In the wake of Mrs. Wilcox's death, her family is further thrown by her final request regarding Howards End; the Schlegels face eviction; the Schlegel sisters take up the cause of Jacky Bast's husband.

programme.title: Howards End
programme.desc: S01E03 Margaret receives an offer from Henry; Helen is distraught by the unfair fate of the Basts; the three families collide at a wedding; Henry's past is revealed.

programme.title: Howards End

programme.title: Perfect High

programme.title: Whale

programme.title: Akeelah and the Bee
programme.desc: Movie (2006) Akeelah, an 11-year-old girl living in South Los Angeles, discovers she has a talent for spelling, which she hopes will take her to the National Spelling Bee.

programme.title: The Color Purple
programme.desc: Movie (1985) A black Southern woman (Whoopi Goldberg) struggles to find her identity after suffering years of abuse from her father and others over 40 years.

programme.title: Bad Boys
programme.desc: Movie (1995) Two hip detectives protect a witness to a murder while investigating a case of stolen heroin from the evidence storage room from their police precinct.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: S03E01 Detroit vs Everybody Meech officially relocates to Atlanta in search of expanding BMF; Terry remains in Detroit to maintain the BMF enterprise and to start a new life for his family; Meech learns that the move to Atlanta will be full of pleasant and unpleasant surprises.

programme.title: BMF
programme.desc: S03E02 Magic Makers Meech focuses on expanding BMF into Atlanta while Terry balances maintaining BMF and his family in Detroit; Terry looks for ways to generate revenue for BMF, and Meech comes through with Colombian connects.

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: Movie (1996) A man (James Spader) and wife who get thrills from car accidents hook up with the head (Elias Koteas) of a group that stages famous wrecks.

programme.title: eXistenZ
programme.desc: Movie (1999) The creator/tester (Jennifer Jason Leigh) of a corporeally invasive game must elude assassins with the help of a security guard (Jude Law).

programme.title: Run This Town
programme.desc: Movie (2019) A journalist and a political aide become entangled in a larger-than-life scandal.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E16 Awakening Magnus and Tesla investigate a former Praxian stronghold and realize they may have stumbled upon secrets to the Vampiris race.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E17 Normandy In June 1944, members of The Five are recruited for a mission to Normandy, ahead of the landings; the Reich is using a powerful abnormal to power a weapon and the Allies can't land until the weapon is neutralized.

programme.title: Ballerina
programme.desc: Movie (2016) A look at the Australian Ballet's first aboriginal dancer and her impact on the industry. Featuring interviews, dance sequences, and archive footage that showcases how Ella remains grounded in her own culture while performing.

programme.title: Air Bud: Golden Receiver
programme.desc: Movie (1998) A golden retriever with a flair for sports helps a boy (Kevin Zegers) handle football and the new boyfriend (Gregory Harrison) of the boy's widowed mother (Cynthia Stevenson).

programme.title: Racetime
programme.desc: Movie (2018) After losing a rigged sled race, Frankie challenges newcomer Zac to one last showdown. With the stakes higher than ever, Zac will stop at nothing to win the race.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry's Giant Adventure
programme.desc: Movie (2013) Tom and Jerry encounter a grumpy giant after climbing a beanstalk to a magical land.

programme.title: Weathering With You
programme.desc: Movie (2019) A boy runs away to Tokyo and befriends a girl who appears to be able to manipulate the weather.

programme.title: Gnomeo & Juliet
programme.desc: Movie (2011) Love-struck garden gnomes (James McAvoy, Emily Blunt) become part of a feud between rival neighbors in Stratford-Upon-Avon, Shakespeare's birthplace.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E12 Hangover Helen returns to find that the sanctuary has been trashed and members of the team have been attacking one another.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E13 One Night Looking to share a quiet evening out with Abby, Will and his date are abducted en route to the restaurant by a gang leader who faces certain death without their help; upon learning the abductor's identity, Magnus ceases all attempts at rescue.

programme.title: Air Bud: Seventh Inning Fetch
programme.desc: Movie (2002) The golden retriever joins a middle-school baseball team and searches for his missing offspring.

programme.title: Air Bud: World Pup
programme.desc: Movie (2000) The golden retriever helps his young owner (Kevin Zegers) and his coed soccer team to shine while outsmarting a wily dogcatcher.

programme.title: A Knight's Tale
programme.desc: Movie (2001) An English commoner (Heath Ledger) dons the armor of a dead jouster and , with the help of friends (Mark Addy, Paul Bettany, Alan Tudyk), competes against nobles in 14th-century France.

programme.title: The Prestige
programme.desc: Movie (2006) After an illusion goes tragically wrong, two 19th-century magicians (Hugh Jackman, Christian Bale) engage in a bitter and potentially deadly rivalry.

programme.title: Hyena Road ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2015) During the war in Afghanistan, an intelligence officer (Paul Gross) enlists a sniper (Rossif Sutherland) to track down a legendary freedom fighter.

programme.title: Presumed Innocent ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (1990) A married prosecutor (Harrison Ford) hires an attorney (Raul Julia) to defend him against charges of murdering his seductive colleague.

programme.title: Power Book IV: Force
programme.desc: S03E10 Beginning of the End The mounting pressure for retaliation looms, as disastrous moves and shocking secrets shake the streets.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: S02E01 Tale of Two Brothers Growing up in Detroit alongside his brother Meech, Terry reflects on their journey; the Flenory family faced the threat of losing everything, pushing the brothers to the drug trade; however, success in the game often comes with deadly rivalries.

programme.title: The Art of the Steal
programme.desc: Movie (2013) Crunch Calhoun, a motorcycle daredevil and art thief, agrees to help his brother with one last heist. As Crunch gathers his old team and plans to steal a priceless book, he has no idea his brother has his own hidden agenda.

programme.title: The F Word
programme.desc: Movie (2013) A medical-school dropout tries to hide his attraction to his new friend, a bubbly artist who already has a boyfriend.

programme.title: Ozzy
programme.desc: Movie (2016) A lovable dog must rely on some new friends to help it break out of canine prison and get back home to his owners.

programme.title: Singin' in the Rain
programme.desc: Movie (1952) A silent-film star (Gene Kelly) loves a chorus girl (Debbie Reynolds) who dubs his squeaky-voiced co-star in a 1927 Hollywood talkie.

programme.title: Father of the Bride
programme.desc: Movie (1991) A harried patriarch (Steve Martin) faces separation anxiety, exorbitant costs and more as he prepares for his daughter's (Kimberly Williams) wedding.

programme.title: Despicable Me
programme.desc: Movie (2010) As he tries to execute a fiendish plot to steal the moon, a supervillain meets his match in three little orphan girls who want to make him their dad.

programme.title: Despicable Me 2
programme.desc: Movie (2013) Just as Gru settles into his new role as a suburban family man, the ultrasecret Anti-Villain League sends him on a mission to nab the perpetrator of a spectacular heist.

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Movie (2017) Fired from the Anti-Villain League, Gru travels to Freedonia to meet his long-lost twin brother for the first time. The siblings soon find themselves in an uneasy alliance to take down Balthazar Bratt, a former 1980s child star who's out for revenge.

programme.title: Minions
programme.desc: Movie (2015) On a mission to find a new master to serve, three Minions meet Scarlet Overkill (Sandra Bullock) the world's first female supervillain.

programme.title: Matilda
programme.desc: Movie (1996) A little girl develops extraordinary mental abilities, despite neglectful parents and a brutal headmistress.

programme.title: Mr. Peabody & Sherman ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2014) After Sherman (Max Charles) and Penny (Ariel Winter) take his time machine for a joyride, Mr. Peabody (Ty Burrell) must come to the rescue before the past, present and future are changed forever.

programme.title: Bridesmaids ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2011) Though broke and lovelorn, a woman (Kristen Wiig) takes on the strange and expensive rituals associated with being her best friend's maid of honor.

programme.title: Girls Trip ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2017) Four best friends travel to New Orleans for the annual Essence Festival. Along the way, they rekindle their sisterhood and rediscover their wild side by doing enough dancing, drinking, brawling and romancing to make the Big Easy blush.

programme.title: A Star Is Born
programme.desc: Movie (2018) Hard-drinking country music star Jackson Maine discovers and falls in love with a struggling, but talented singer named Ally. As her career quickly takes off, Jackson starts to realize that his best days may be behind him.

programme.title: Mommy
programme.desc: Movie (2014) A peculiar neighbor (Suzanne Clément) offers hope to a recent widow (Anne Dorval) who is struggling to raise a teenager (Antoine-Olivier Pilon) who is unpredictable and, sometimes, violent.

programme.title: Tia and Piujuq
programme.desc: Movie (2018) A 10-year-old Syrian refugee living in Montreal finds a magic portal leading to the Arctic.

programme.title: Ice Age
programme.desc: Movie (2002) A woolly mammoth (Ray Romano), a saber-toothed tiger (Denis Leary) and a sloth (John Leguizamo) find a human baby and try to reunite him with his tribe.

programme.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
programme.desc: Movie (2006) Manny (Ray Romano), Sid (John Leguizamo) and Diego (Denis Leary) reunite to warn their friends about the danger to their homes posed by swiftly melting ice.

programme.title: Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Movie (2009) Manny (Ray Romano), Diego (Denis Leary) and the rest of the gang must rescue Sid (John Leguizamo) from an underground world after Sid steals some dinosaur eggs.

programme.title: Ice Age: Continental Drift
programme.desc: Movie (2012) Scrat's pursuit of an infernal acorn has world-changing consequences for Manny (Ray Romano), Diego (Denis Leary) and Sid (John Leguizamo).

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.desc: Movie (2018) Peter Rabbit and his three sisters enjoy spending their days in Mr. McGregor's vegetable garden. A battle of wills soon breaks out as McGregor hatches scheme after scheme to get rid of Peter -- a rabbit who proves to be a worthy and wily opponent.

programme.title: Annie
programme.desc: Movie (2014) A plucky youngster (Quvenzhané Wallis) escapes the clutches of her calculating foster mother and charms her way into the heart of a hard-nosed tycoon (Jamie Foxx), who's running for mayor.

programme.title: Casper
programme.desc: Movie (1995) A teen (Christina Ricci) who lost her mother befriends friendly ghost Casper while staying at a mean heiress's (Cathy Moriarty) haunted mansion.

programme.title: The Monuments Men
programme.desc: Movie (2014) During World War II, a group of art scholars and other experts infiltrates enemy territory to retrieve stolen masterpieces before the Nazis destroy them.

programme.title: Ocean's Twelve ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2004) To pay back casino boss Terry Benedict, Danny Ocean and his team of criminals plan an elaborate heist in Europe.

programme.title: Ocean's Thirteen ᴺᵉʷ
programme.desc: Movie (2007) Danny Ocean and his gang hatch an ambitious plot for revenge after ruthless casino owner Willy Bank double-crosses Reuben Tishkoff, Danny's friend and mentor.

programme.title: Power Book IV: Force
programme.desc: S03E10 Beginning of the End The mounting pressure for retaliation looms, as disastrous moves and shocking secrets shake the streets.

programme.title: The BMF Documentary: Blowing Money Fast
programme.desc: S02E01 Tale of Two Brothers Growing up in Detroit alongside his brother Meech, Terry reflects on their journey; the Flenory family faced the threat of losing everything, pushing the brothers to the drug trade; however, success in the game often comes with deadly rivalries.

programme.title: Foolproof
programme.desc: Movie (2003) A criminal (David Suchet) blackmails young people (Ryan Reynolds, Kristin Booth) who plot high-tech robberies into stealing $30 million.

programme.title: Blood Quantum
programme.desc: Movie (2019) The dead are coming back to life and almost all of Earth's population are decimated due to a zombie virus, except for the isolated Mi'kmaq reserve of Red Crow, whose indigenous inhabitants are strangely immune to the zombie plague.

programme.title: Step Dogs
programme.desc: Movie (2013) Meatball, a wise cracking country dog, and Cassie, Hollywood's most pampered pet, meet when their owners get married. The two fight constantly until burglars break into their house and they must team up to protect their home.

programme.title: Perfect High
programme.desc: Movie (2015) A teen's (Bella Thorne) life spirals out of control when she starts abusing painkillers and heroin with her new friends (Israel Broussard, Daniela Bobadilla) from school.

programme.title: Space Jam
programme.desc: Movie (1996) In a desperate attempt to win a basketball match and earn their freedom, the Looney Tunes seek the aid of retired basketball champion, Michael Jordan.

programme.title: Nelly & Simon: Mission Yeti
programme.desc: Movie (2017) A private eye and a university research assistant search for the abominable snowman in the Himalayas.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E14 Metamorphosis Dr Helen Magnus, a 158-year-old English scientist, seeks out extraordinarily-powered creatures, known as Abnormals.

programme.title: Sanctuary
programme.desc: S03E15 Wingman Will and Henry's double date goes awry when Magnus insists they do a routine delivery of an Abnormal en route.

programme.title: Surf's Up
programme.desc: Movie (2007) Followed by a documentary film crew, a teenage penguin heads to Pen Gu Island for his first professional surfing competition.

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Movie (2007) In 1960s Baltimore a plump teen (Nikki Blonsky) becomes an overnight celebrity after she wins a spot on a local dance program called "The Corny Collins Show."

programme.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
programme.desc: Movie (1967) White liberals must overcome their own latent racism when their strong-willed daughter announces her intention to marry a distinguished black physician.

Movie (2013) In 1946, Branch Rickey (Harrison Ford), general manager of the Brooklyn Dodgers, signs Jackie Robinson (Chadwick Boseman) to the team in defiance of major league baseball's notorious color barrier.

programme.title: Malcolm X
programme.desc: Movie (1992) The civil-rights leader (Denzel Washington) rises from criminal to crusader, undergoing a religious conversion while jailed.

programme.title: Poor Boy's Game
programme.desc: Movie (2007) While preparing for a boxing match, an ex-convict receives support from the man whose son he beat up.

programme.title: Night Raiders
programme.desc: Movie (2021) In a post-war future, a mother joins an underground band of vigilantes to try and rescue her daughter from a state-run institution.

programme.title: Passchendaele
programme.desc: Movie (2008) Sgt. Dunne (Paul Gross) returns to war to look after a nurse's brother.

programme.title: Air Bud: Spikes Back
programme.desc: Movie (2003) A dog that plays volleyball helps investigators solve a rash of mysterious crimes.

programme.title: Clara
programme.desc: Movie (2018) In a race to find intelligent life in the universe, an astronomer and his freethinking research assistant make an inexplicable discovery that changes how they see the world -- and each other.

programme.title: The Land Before Time
programme.desc: Movie (1988) An orphaned dinosaur and his new friends face a danger-laden journey to a beautiful, food-rich valley.

programme.title: 2025 Grey Cup : Montreal Alouettes vs. Saskatchewan Roughriders
programme.desc: The Alouettes and Roughriders duel in the 112th Grey Cup. Both teams needed semifinal heroics, with Tommy Nield's touchdown catch with 12 seconds left getting Saskatchewan by BC 24-21, while Montreal upset Hamilton 19-16 on a last-second field goal.

programme.title: NFL Football : San Francisco 49ers at Seattle Seahawks ᴸᶦᵛᵉ
programme.desc: The Seahawks (14-3) host the 49ers (12-5) in the NFC Divisional Round. Seattle secured the No. 1 seed, while the 49ers advanced after an upset win over the Eagles. Seahawks won the most recent showdown 13-3 against the 49ers to clinch the NFC West.
